Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.2 Akusalapada » 2.4.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
57.
1380Hetuñceva sahetukañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā…  nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
58.
1381Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1382Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1383Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1384(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
